definition: silk brocade bag, used in ancient times to hold poetry manuscripts and other precious items/(fig.) tip (a piece of practical advice)
brocade sack of miracle plans (idiom); bag of tricks/fiendishly cunning masterplan (written out by strategic genius of fiction, and given to the local commander in a brocade bag)

sentences.english: To get myself to actually do, my favorite trick is the 50 minutes rule.
sentences.chinese: 努力让自己上路，我的锦囊妙计是50分钟法则。

sentences.english: Tom had an ace up his sleeve.
sentences.chinese: 汤姆备有锦囊妙计胸有成竹。

sentences.english: Please refer to Manulife Investment Solutions Application Form for definition of risk level.
sentences.chinese: 风险水平请參考宏利智富锦囊投保申请书。

sentences.english: And a group of researchers in Britain think they have found one.
sentences.chinese: 英国的一组研究人员认为他们自有锦囊妙计。

sentences.english: Unless you've got an ace up your sleeve, we are dished.
sentences.chinese: 除非你有锦囊妙计，否则，我们是输定了。

sentences.english: Unless you've had ace up your sleeve, we are dished.
sentences.chinese: 除非你有锦囊妙计，否则我们是输定了。

sentences.english: Send 17 safety management tips for your reference.
sentences.chinese: 送上17个安全管理小锦囊，供您参考。

sentences.english: Think of them as an influential, personal support team.
sentences.chinese: 当他们是一个有影响力的个人的锦囊团。

sentences.english: Unless you have an ace up your sleeve, we are dished.
sentences.chinese: 除非你有锦囊妙计，否则我们是输定了。

sentences.english: The next bright idea could change history.
sentences.chinese: 下一个锦囊妙计将会改变历史。

sentences.english: Olmsted had several other tricks up his sleeve .
sentences.chinese: 奥姆斯特德还有其它的锦囊妙计。

sentences.english: Do you have any tricks or tips that you use to help reduce information overload?
sentences.chinese: 亲爱的读者，您是否也有对付信息过载的锦囊妙计呢？

sentences.english: And since you probably have lots of ideas, the bigger the jar the better.
sentences.chinese: 而且当你有可能有许多想法时，锦囊越大越好。

sentences.english: Introduce fashion products, using pictures to highlight recommended buys and purchase tips.
sentences.chinese: 时装产品介绍，以图片为主的购物锦囊和必买目录。

definition: embroidered pouch for carrying loose change etc/purse/pocket (in clothing)
pouch/sack/bag/Budai (the Laughing Buddha)/Budai or Putai town in Chiayi county 嘉義縣|嘉义县[Jia1 yi4 xian4], west Taiwan
canonical text/treasury (i.e. book of treasured wisdom)
arrow banner of command (archaic used as symbol of military authority)/fig. instructions from one's superiors
